subject: Tennis
Gerry Weber Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Roger Federer moved closer to a record eighth title at the Gerry Weber Open by beating Ernests Gulbis, 6-3, 7-5, to reach the quarterfinals.
snippet: Top-seeded Roger Federer moved closer to a record eighth title at the Gerry Weber Open by beating Ernests Gulbis, 6-3, 7-5, to reach the quarterfinals.
